sections.title: Verse 1
content: Standing on the promises of Christ my King,
Through eternal ages let His praises ring;
Glory in the highest, I will shout and sing,
Standing on the promises of God.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Standing on the promises that cannot fail,
When the storms of doubt and fear assault the soul;
By the living Word of God I shall prevail,
Standing on the promises of God.

sections.title: Chorus
content: Standing on the promises of Christ the Lord,
Bound by His unchanging love forevermore;
Earth may pass away, and the heavens fade,
But the Word of God shall stand forevermore!
